mapper.select: SELECT store.* FROM store JOIN local ON store.id = local.store_id WHERE local.local = #{location}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_like (member_id, store_id, created_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{storeId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member_like WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.select: SELECT store_id AS storeId, COUNT(*) AS likeCount FROM Member_Like WHERE store_id = #{storeId} GROUP BY store_id
